a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}LUGAL-IGI.LAL-a-ni lu DI-mu ana LUGAL EN-ia DI-mu a-na {ANŠE}a-ṣa-pi DI-mu a-na {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ ša LUGAL LUGAL EN is-sap-ra ma-a na-ah-ri-da ina UGU pi-i ša LUGAL EN-ia {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ ša E₂-{1}da-kur up-ta-hi-ra x u₂-sa-aš₂-liṭ u₃ {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ gab-bu x x x u₂ EN in {1}{d}PA-tak-lak-ma u₂-sa-aš₂-liṭ ma-a ina UGU pi-ia le-pu-šu ma-a E₂-EN-e-a E₂-EN-e-a lu la i-ša₂-liṭ {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ ša x x gab-bi URU-a.a šu-nu ina pa-ni-ni i-za-zu ma-a šum-ma {1}{d}PA-tak-lak i-ra-da-na-ši ma-a ina UGU LUGAL be-li-ni ni-lak ma-a x x LUGAL EN-e-ni li-ir-da-na-ši x x x x x-bi u₃ {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ ša E₂-x+x x x x la i-kan-nu-šu₂ u₃ is-se-niš x x x x x x x x i-ba-ši {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ ša x x x x x {1}{d}PA-tak-lak am-ru x x x x x x x x x x+x {LU₂}QAL₃ kal x x x x x x x x x {1}{d}AMAR.UTU-NUMUN-DU₃ x+x x x x x x x x x x+x ka-du x+x x x x x x x x x x x x+x-ka-ni x x x x x x x x x x x x-u-ni x x x x x x x x x
